464460.name: XO-Planets OST
464460.description:
This DLC contains the full original soundtrack from XO-Planets. All 14 tracks plus 5 bonus tracks.
They are all in MP3 format and can be played via Steam Music player.

All proceeds from the sales of this DLC will go to the composer, and you can find them here:
Trevor Lentz
Joe Reynolds(Professorlamp)
Perry Butler (HECTAVEX)

Tracks Included:
Ritchie's Sea - Joe Reynolds
The Piano - Trevor Lentz
Adventures - Trevor Lentz
Eclipse - Trevor Lentz
Born Synthetic - Trevor Lentz
Firefight - Trevor Lentz
Inanimate - Trevor Lentz
Followed - Trevor Lentz
Laser - Trevor Lentz
Push - Trevor Lentz
Rinse & Repeat - Trevor Lentz
Antehymn - Perry Butler
Survive - Trevor Lentz
All Things End Pt 2 - Trevor Lentz

Bonus Tracks
All Things End Pt 1 - Trevor Lentz
Unleashed - Trevor Lentz
Envy - Trevor Lentz
Portal - Trevor Lentz
Night - Trevor Lentz
